review: We used this to watch Netflix, rent movies or listen to music--the quality of the streaming is generally excellent, better than our usual cable transmission. We also use Airplay to send music or pictures from our iPad.  (We have an Apple airport router) It is simple to use, takes little space, and the remote is easy for anyone to learn.  (With a bit of effort, the Harmony remotes will work with it as well, but the Apple remote is so simple and effective that we prefer it )  Beautifully designed.  We have two and have not noticed any problems with both being used at the same time.  Please note that it does require the use of HDMI but does not require any other apple products.
